    • Method Detail

      • detectBypass

        public static java.lang.String detectBypass(Instruction iFirst,
                                            Instruction iSecond)
        Detects the need for forwarding/bypassing.
        Parameters:
        iFirst - The first instruction.
        iSecond - The second instruction.
        Returns:
        null if no bypass needed; RS or RT when bypass is necessary.

      • detectStall

        public static int detectStall(Instruction i)
        Detects the need for a stall.
        Parameters:
        i - The instruction to detect.
        Returns:
        0 if no need to stall; 1 if it's load-use hazard; 2 if it's branch hazard.
